xml.brief: Get information on available geocache properties

desc.p: This method tells which geocache properties are available at this OKAPI installation.

You may need it when editing geocache listings and when searching for caches by cache type. In all other cases, you don't need to know about differences between OKAPI installations. But still this method may help to improve usability of your app, e.g. by hiding unnecessary search options.

returns.p: A dictionary of the following structure:

li.p: types - list of the cache types which are currently available at this installation. See the services/caches/geocache method for more information on cache types.
sizes - list of the cache sizes which are currently available at this installation.
has_ratings - boolean, true if this installation can store geocache quality ratings. OKAPI provides methods to submit and retrieve ratings, and to search for geocaches by rating.
password_max_length - the maximum length of a password that will be accepted by services/caches/edit.
